attributes.action: Put the face of Lord Nelson on all of the pound notes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the face of Lord Nelson, a symbol of Britain great historic past and military power, should be placed on the 5, 10, 20 and 50 pound notes.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Bank of England
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
